shutDown() - Method in class surrounding.FieldRunner

SimTester - Class in main
SimTester is a test program, testing the functionality of a wireless node network which has been implemented to pass messages using the rumor-routing algorithm.

The test simulation is run for 10000 updates, for as short as 10 seconds (1000 updates / second).
SimTester() - Constructor for class main.SimTester
 
SimTestNodeNetworkGenerator - Class in surrounding
Implementation of the NodeNetworkGenerator interface.
SimTestNodeNetworkGenerator(Field) - Constructor for class surrounding.SimTestNodeNetworkGenerator
 
StandardNodeNetworkGenerator - Class in surrounding
The StandardNodeNetworkGenerator generates a grid of nodes (network), based on specified number of nodes, their distance to one and another, etc.
StandardNodeNetworkGenerator(int, int, int, int, int, int, Field) - Constructor for class surrounding.StandardNodeNetworkGenerator
Creates a StandardNodeNetworkGenerator object to prepare for the creation of a node network grid.
